snippet.title: Bum Fights Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Get ready to dive into the chaotic world of Bum Fights, an intense online multiplayer top-down shooter that will test your skills in the most hilarious and brutal way! Battle in a nostalgic medieval setting, starting as a penniless warrior striving for glory and survival. Whether you’re going solo against other players in the arena or teaming up to fight against hordes of undead, every match is a fight for your life.
.
Wishlist Bum Fights on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/23...
.
🕹Game info:
Title: Bum Fights
Developer: Sick Fish ​⁠‪@SickFishStudios‬ 
IG: https://www.instagram.com/sick_fish_s...
Platform: PC [Steam]
Coming Soon!
.
Follow Us for More Indie Game Trailers & Content:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/share/XZNWrH...

.
